description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTMeningococcalPolysaccharideVaccines for IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Polysaccharide vaccines. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Polysaccharide vaccines schedule (Polysaccharide vaccines can be used to control outbreaks in countries where limited economic resources or insufficient supply restrict the use of meningococcal conjugate vaccines)
